wikipedia_page.main: Ruth Lupton is an English cricketer and former member of the England women's cricket team. She was born in 1964 and played one test, against New Zealand at Scarborough, and two one day internationals, both at the 1995 Women's European Cricket Cup.

link_mentions.page: Lancashire and Cheshire Women cricket team
New Zealand women's cricket team in England and Ireland in 1996
